评论详情: Originally was a purchase required for my daughter's tap recital.  Some of the girls didn't like it, so they changed to another costume.  My 17 year old adores it.  She's been a "pirate" so many times in it - it's her go to costume for Halloween or any dress up party.

This was comfortable and fit well and wasn't too hot for the FL sun in July.  We got married and when he saw this was sleeveless and had tails he just had to have it for our wedding.  We were pleased with the quality of the fabric, it was well made.
Garmet was well made, fit perfectly for my costume. Lends itself to other costume ideas as well. Pleased with purchase…. Once I found correct size.
Uhh.. runs WAY larger than sizing chart. Size chart said an XXL is a 46.9 chest… it’s about a 51.5“ fyi. Thanks a lot not i have to take it in myself.
Wrinkled, damaged, would need adjustment.
Great vest. Fabric looks beautiful.

I loved the fabric of it and it fit amazing. The size wasn't too far off and works perfect for my Human Stolas cospaly. It's a lightweight fabric and the detail on it is amazing. It's worth the money in my opinion and it's held up to me tossing it on and off, soo very durable. I love the material personally, it soft on the inside and not to rough on outside.

评论概述: Misleading Labeling and Design - Not a Men's Waistcoat
评论详情: I was quite excited about the "Men's Victorian Suit Vest Steampunk Gothic Medieval Waistcoat Costume" as the design and fabric initially met my expectations. The fabric is indeed commendable, with a comfortable feel and a quality appearance that promises to stand out at any themed event or costume party.  However, the excitement was short-lived upon discovering a significant issue: this is not a men's waistcoat. The most glaring mistake is that the buttons are on the wrong side, aligning with the style of a woman's garment, not a man's. This is a basic aspect of design that should not be overlooked, especially when the product is specifically marketed for men. It's misleading and could cause inconvenience for anyone looking specifically for men's attire.  Despite the fabric's quality and the vest's overall aesthetic appeal, the incorrect button arrangement is a major drawback. It might be suitable for some buyers who do not mind this issue, but it was a dealbreaker for me. I would advise potential buyers to consider this factor carefully before purchasing.
I love the details, color and length! I got a XL which is a bit big on me but that's all on me. I got paranoid thinking the L will be small but nope! But overall it's nice! Very comfortable too!
Missing bottom 2 buttons, the button holes weren't even made into the vest, disappointed but ordering costume clothes from chy na is always hit or miss, returned for money back.

评论概述: wish it came in a smaller size!
评论详情: really good quality and feels thick, overall is just super nice and really adds to my stolas cosplay! i just wish they made them smaller!
Looks great! Really nice fabric- clothing quality, not thin or cheap feeling like most costume pieces.  Runs a bit big though.

Super bummed this didn’t turn out as cool as I’d hoped. I’ve tried two different sizes and neither is really accurate. I’m tall and thin. This vest is wide and soupy. It also doesn’t come down where a vest should. Rather than coming down to your waist, your belly/bottom of your shirt sticks out. Thank goodness I don’t actually have a Santa belly!
I like that it fit very well. The jacket does run a bit bigger then True to size. I originally bought a medium but went for a small

I was pleasantly surprised by the construction of this but as other people have noted it runs large. I took it in at least 3-4 inches after purchasing a small. The buttons seem a little loose, but thats to be expected with large decorative buttons like these.
Measure carefully. I usually take a size L or XL but I went by the chest size on the measurement chart and ordered a size Medium. It fits precisely well. Love it!

Love love it! Nice thick well quality material vest. The button holes are sturdy and can with stand my husband. I highly recommend. Only thing I caution to customers is it's off white not bright white which I like because it shows less dirt.

We purchased this for a trip to tombstone for our 16 year old. The material is very nice quality. It did run large, but we easily pinned the back. My son is on the thin side, so I anticipated that. He is 16, 5’11”, and maybe 165. We purchased a large I believe. The length was perfect, but the waste was large. As I said though, we just pinned it and it was perfect. I would highly recommend this.
Ordered medium fits like xl
I was actually surprised by the weight of it. It is made with very nice fabric. Can't wait to use this in a cosplay.
Had this for a moulin rouge shoot. It was a hit. I felt very comfortable in it and so fancy.
This vest was beautiful and fabric was much richer than expected. Buttons do have to be stitched a bit better.

I'd like to preface that I'm not a big guy by any standard, 5'10, 150lbs, about 30in waist.  I got a small (the smallest size offered) and it fits me like an XL usually does.  However I did know going into buying this that it was going to be big on me, but since it's the only one I could find with the cut style I wanted in white I went for it.Also, the buttons aren't seen on great, and the lining is very baggy inside.  Otherwise the vest is great, the outer fabric looks great, the cut and seems are good as well.
Love it. Perfect fit!!

This thing is utter garbage. I mean I wasn't expecting a lot from this, especially at this price point, but it completely failed to meet even those basic expectations. Out doesn't even look good from 30' away. Spirit Halloween would be ashamed to have this on its shelves. Do not bother.

Well made vest and quality. I rated a 4 star because the color was off from the picture. I wanted the vibrant red but instead received a more wine red or almost burgundy color. But the everything else about the item was well made and put together.
I never tried this on before I got it and wore it out for this year's new year's eve people loved this whole look

I've bought a few vests like this from other sellers/brands, all in size small. Those fit me perfectly. This one feels a good size and a half too large. I'm a small man: 5'5" in height, 36S jacket, 28" waist. So if your measurements are in that vicinity, expect this to need some fairly extensive tailoring.  Beyond the sizing issues, it feels like a very nice vest. Definitely the thickest and heaviest of its kind that I've found. The buttons are, as others have said, a bit large for the button holes, but on my copy, they do still function - just takes some effort. They seem to be sewn on quite securely on mine, unlike other reviewers have mentioned. The hourglass figure that the vest takes on in the product images does not seem to represent the actual cut of the vest, which is fine in my book; I prefer a straighter cut.  Overall, I would suggest you'll probably want to order a size down, as long as you're not quite as small as I am.
Amazing buy! But I ordered a XL and I should have ordered a L

评论概述: Great for a steam punk costume
评论详情: Fit as expected and good quality for the price.

I loved everything about this item except the buttons! They were too large to fit in the slits to button. After fixing thst issue all of the buttons came off after buttoning because there was barely and thread holding them on! I had to sew them back on! Super frustrating but I loved everything else about the vest! The length was great the texture was spot on. Just wish the buttons were higher quality.
The fit was perfect and the quality was just as I would expect. Delivery was faster than I expected.

Upon pulling it from the bag and putting it on … It looked and felt great! However, I went to fasten the button and it popped off. Not a big problem, bc I needed it slightly altered to fit perfectly. I went to get the buttons reinforced. Ironically, as I was trying to on for the seamstress, another button popped off.  I would give this product 4 stars but the button eye (The hole for the button) is the main problem and it can’t be cut to fix.  3 stars … This product is good. I love how it looks and feels (Minus the button issues.)
